sentences.english: The position of Brodmann 17 area corresponded to the anatomical definition.

sentences.chinese: 採用視區成型技術保證微波和紅外視區能夠良好匹配。

sentences.english: By simulating the light path of lenticular lens, the characteristics of stereo viewing zones were analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 通過模擬柱透鏡光路，分析了立體視區特性。

sentences.english: The field of view can be limited by inserting a stop in the focal plane of microscope.
sentences.chinese: 可以在顯微鏡的焦平面上加裝一光闌，從而限制視區。

sentences.english: First, notice that in the head of the document, I set the viewport.
